name: What Creeps Below
description:
In this 2D platformer, you play as Alli accompanied by their little rootling companion, Rad.

Manoeuvring in environments that are less than welcoming to you, jumping, dashing and exploring the tunnels of Radix Quadrata. These tunnels are filled with mystery as they are with danger.

Rad, the rootling wants nothing more than to go back home to his family.

 So are you going to help the little guy?

- Instructions:

  WASD = Movement

  Space = Jump

  U = Dash

- Heads up!:

  You can only dash Twice Mid-air, you must be on the ground to reset your dash!

Credits:

- Xiao-Long Rathje Zhao - Lead Director, Composer, Sound Designer.

- Trinity Jacob Farraj - Producer, Level Designer, Narrative Designer, Project Manager.

- Otto Roberts Olsteins -  Programmer, Level Designer.

- Liv Coro -  Programmer, SFX Designer, Narrative Designer.

- Lina Dahl - Environment Designer, UI Designer, Asset Designer.

- Sophia Bieringer - Character Designer, Animator.

- Erik Jansson - Programmer.

- Humla Karlsson - Voice Actor.

N̴͍̪͆̈́̓o̸͖͚̪͊̚͝t̴̢̠̺͆͛͘h̸̡͓͎͒̿͑i̵̙͕͓͛̕͠n̵͉̞̙͑͘͝g̵̦͚̙͆̓̈́ h̴̢̟͕͑̓̕e̸̡͇̺͒͝͝r̸̙͇̞̔͛e̵̠͚͎͐̾̚ i̵̝̻͎͑̈́͝s̴̫̻̺̈́͆͝ ẅ̸̪͇̟́͒͝h̸̡̡͉̓͒̐á̵͍̙̠̿̕t̸̻̝̿̀͠ i̸̢͇̦̿͘͝ẗ̸̡͉͉́͠͝ s̴̠͍͙̒͑͠e̸̡͕͙̐͆e̴̫͙̼̾͑͆m̴̙͖͍͛̕s̸͎͎͖͆̾͝,̴̘͇͍̐̈́̕ g̵̡͎̺̈́͋̚é̸̪͓͖͋t̸̫͔͕͒̐̕ o̵̟̞̦̒͐͒ǘ̴̞͚̓̚͜t̵͍̠͇͌̕ o̴͙̝͐̈́̿f̵̡͓̈́̐́͜ h̵̡͉͙̐̔͠é̵͎̝̦̀͘r̴̪̙̝̓̚e̴̙͖͉̐̽ w̵̦͕͇̔͌͝h̴̡̫̼̽͌͘i̵̢̡̝͐̾̕l̸͉̞̞̔̽͆e̴͖͖̫̔̈́̚ y̴͖͓̠̿͐͝ò̸̪͍̠͒̾u̴̡̺͌̀͜ s̸̟̾͊̐͜t̸̙͚̾̓͜͝ḯ̴̠̻̠̓͛l̴͖̪̦̀͑͒l̵̦̙͎̾͋̚ c̵̢̙̫͊̓͘a̵͔͎̓͌̚n̸̦̟̽̀̈́!̵̺̺̺̓͊̐!̵̼͍͆͝
